SELECT so.id, so.order_num, so.sender, so.receiver, so.number, so.capacity, so.status, so.creater, so.create_time, so.receive_number, so.receive_capacity, so.receive_time, g.`name` AS goodsName, g.`code` goodsCode, m.merchant_name AS merchantName, se.express_company AS expressCompany, se.express_num AS expressNum, se.number AS expressNumber, se.receive_number AS expressReceiveNumber, se.receive_capacity AS expressReceiveCapacity, se.`status` AS expressStatus, se.id AS expressId
FROM inno72_store_order so LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g on g.id=so.goods LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant m ON m.id =so.merchant LEFT JOIN inno72_store_express se ON se.order_id = so.id WHERE so.id =#{id}

SELECT m.id, m.merchant_name AS name, m.merchant_code AS code FROM inno72_merchant m WHERE m.is_delete =0
and (m.merchant_name like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') or m.merchant_code like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') )

SELECT g.id, g.name, g.code FROM inno72_goods g LEFT JOIN inno72_store_goods sg ON g.id=sg.goods_id WHERE g.is_delete =0 and g.seller_id =#{sellerId} and sg.store_id =#{storeId}
and (g.name like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') or g.code like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.id AS id, a.name AS activityName, 0 AS activityType FROM inno72.inno72_activity_plan ap LEFT JOIN inno72.inno72_activity a ON a.id = ap.activity_id WHERE ap.is_delete = 0 AND now( ) BETWEEN ap.start_time AND ap.end_time GROUP BY a.id UNION SELECT i.id AS id, i.name AS activityName, 1 AS activityType FROM inno72.inno72_interact_machine im LEFT JOIN inno72.inno72_interact_machine_time imt ON im.id = imt.interact_machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72.inno72_machine m ON m.id = im.machine_id LEFT JOIN inno72.inno72_interact i ON i.id = im.interact_id WHERE m.machine_status = 4 AND i.is_delete = 0 AND i.status = 1 AND now( ) BETWEEN imt.start_time AND imt.end_time GROUP BY i.id ) m where 1=1
and (m.activityName like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') or m.code like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') )

SELECT cu.id, cu.`name` FROM inno72_check_user cu WHERE cu.is_delete = 0 AND cu.`status` =0
and (cu.name like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') or cu.code like CONCAT('%','${keyword}','%') )
SELECT cu.id, cu.`name` FROM inno72_check_user cu WHERE cu.id=#{id}

select count(so.id) from inno72_store_order so left join inno72_storekeeper_storte ss on so.receive_id = ss.store_id where ss.storekeeper_id= #{userId} and so.order_type=0 and so.receive_type=2 and so.is_delete = 0

select count(DISTINCT so.id) from inno72_store_order so left join inno72_storekeeper_storte ss on so.send_id = ss.store_id left join inno72_store_express se on so.id=se.order_id where ss.storekeeper_id= #{userId} and so.order_type=1 and (se.express_num is null or se.express_num='') and so.is_delete = 0

select count(so.id) from inno72_store_order so left join inno72_storekeeper_storte ss on so.send_id = ss.store_id where ss.storekeeper_id= #{userId} and so.order_type=1 and so.status=0 and so.receive_type=2 and so.is_delete = 0
